diagnose_tree.f90

00002 ! ======================
00003 !
00004 !   DIAGNOSE_TREE 
00005 !
00006 !   Check integrity of tree structure from hash table
00007 !   
00008 !
00009 ! ======================
00010 
00011 subroutine diagnose_tree
00012 
00013 
00014   use treevars
00015 
00016   implicit none
00017   integer :: key2addr        ! Mapping function to get hash table address from key
00018 
00019   integer*8 :: key_twig(ntwig), key_leaf(nleaf) 
00020   integer, dimension(size_tree) :: node_list, owner_list, addr_list
00021   integer, dimension(ntwig) :: level_twig, nchild_twig, child_twig, addr_twig, ind_twig      ! twig-nodes
00022   integer, dimension(nleaf) :: level_leaf, plist_leaf, ind_leaf, owner_leaf       ! leaf-nodes
00023 
00024   character(30) :: cfile
00025   character(1) :: csnap, collision
00026   integer ic(5),jc(5),lc(5)
00027 
00028   integer :: i, ip, j, ilev, isnap, ibt,ierr
00029   real :: s, xt, yt
00030 
00031   save isnap
00032   data isnap/1/
00033 
00034   csnap=achar(mod(isnap,10)+48)
00035 
00036 
00037   if (me==0) write (*,*) 'DIAGNOSE TREE'
00038   write (ipefile,*) 'DIAGNOSE TREE'
00039 
00040   ! output hash table
00041 
00042   write (ipefile,'(/a/8x,a/8x,a)') 'Hash table ', &
00043        'entry,    owner    node,            key_8     key_10        parent       next       link   # leaves  childcode  collision', &
00044        '----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- '
00045 
00046   ! flag  collisions
00047 
00048   do i=0,maxaddress
00049      collision=" "
00050      if (htable(i)%node/=0 .and. htable(i)%link/= -1 ) collision="C"
00051      if (htable(i)%node /= 0 .and. htable(i)%next >=0) write (ipefile,'(3i10,o22,i10,2o22,i8,i5,z4,4x,a1)') &
00052           i,htable(i)%owner,htable(i)%node,htable(i)%key,htable(i)%key,ishft( htable(i)%key,-3 ), htable(i)%next, &
00053           htable(i)%link,htable(i)%leaves,htable(i)%childcode,collision
00054      if (htable(i)%node /= 0 .and. htable(i)%next <0) write (ipefile,'(3i10,2o15,i15,i15,i5,z4,4x,a1)') &
00055           i,htable(i)%owner,htable(i)%node,htable(i)%key,ishft( htable(i)%key,-3 ), htable(i)%next, &
00056           htable(i)%link,htable(i)%leaves,htable(i)%childcode,collision
00057   end do
00058 
00059 
00060 
00061  ! get keys of twig nodes from hash table
00062   key_twig(1:ntwig)  = pack(htable(0:maxaddress)%key,mask=htable(0:maxaddress)%node<0)
00063  ! get levels of twigs
00064   addr_twig(1:ntwig) = (/( key2addr( key_twig(i),'DIAGNOSE_TREE' ),i=1,ntwig)/)   !  Table address
00065   child_twig(1:ntwig) = (/( htable( key2addr( key_twig(i),'DIAGNOSE_TREE' ) )%childcode,i=1,ntwig )/)   !  Children byte-code
00066   ind_twig(1:ntwig) = (/( htable( key2addr( key_twig(i),'DIAGNOSE_TREE' ) )%node,i=1,ntwig )/)   !  Twig node pointers
00067 
00068 
00069 
00070   write (ipefile,'(
00071 
00072 !  write (ipefile,'(/a/a/(3i5,2i10,2i8,b11,i2,i8,i10,9(1pe15.4)))') 'Twigs from hash-table:', &
00073   write (ipefile,'(/a/a/(3i5,2o15,2i8,z4,i2,o15,i5,10(1pe15.4)))') 'Twigs from hash-table:', &
00074        '    i  level  owner   key    parent-key    #     node     code    #c  1st child    #leaves ', &
00075        (i,node_level(ind_twig(i)), &              !  index, level
00076          htable( key2addr( key_twig(i),'DIAGNOSE_TREE' ) )%owner, &                            ! Owner-PE of node
00077          key_twig(i),ishft( key_twig(i),-3 ), &                             ! key, parent key
00078          addr_twig(i), ind_twig(i), &    ! Table address and node number
00079          child_twig(i), &                         ! Children byte-code 
00080          n_children( ind_twig(i) ), &
00081          first_child( ind_twig(i) ), &            ! key of 1st child
00082          htable( addr_twig(i) )%leaves, &                           ! # leaves contained in branch 
00083          abs_charge(ind_twig(i)), &    ! Twig absolute charge
00084          charge(ind_twig(i)), &    ! Twig  charge
00085          xcoc(ind_twig(i)), & ! Centre of charge
00086          ycoc(ind_twig(i)), &  
00087          xdip(ind_twig(i)), &  
00088          ydip(ind_twig(i)), &  
00089          jx(ind_twig(i)), &  
00090          jy(ind_twig(i)), &  
00091          magmx(ind_twig(i)), &  
00092          magmy(ind_twig(i)), &  
00093 !         xxquad(ind_twig(i)), &  
00094 !         yyquad(ind_twig(i)), &  
00095 !         xyquad(ind_twig(i)), &  
00096          i=1,ntwig)     
00097        
00098 
00099  ! get keys of local leaf nodes from hash table
00100   key_leaf(1:nleaf_me) = pack(htable%key,mask=(htable%node>0 .and. htable%owner == me))
00101   ind_leaf(1:nleaf_me) = pack(htable%node,mask=(htable%node>0 .and. htable%owner == me))         ! particle/leaf index
00102   plist_leaf(1:nleaf_me) = pack(htable%childcode,mask=(htable%node>0 .and. htable%owner == me))   ! particle label
00103   owner_leaf(1:nleaf_me) = pack(htable%owner,mask=(htable%node>0 .and. htable%owner == me))   ! who owns leaf node
00104 
00105 
00106   write (ipefile,'(/a/3a5,2a10,2a15,a25,4a11/(3i5,2i10,2o15,o25,2f11.4,2f11.4))') 'Local leaves from hash-table:', &
00107        'i','owner','plab','i-leaf','lev','key','parent','pkey','x','y','q','jx', &
00108        (i,owner_leaf(i),plist_leaf(i),ind_leaf(i),node_level(ind_leaf(i)),key_leaf(i), &
00109         ishft( key_leaf(i),-3 ), &      ! parent
00110         pekey(ind_leaf(i)), &  ! particle key
00111         x(ind_leaf(i)),y(ind_leaf(i)), q(ind_leaf(i)), jx(ind_leaf(i)), &
00112         i=1,nleaf_me)
00113 
00114  ! get keys of NON-local leaf nodes from hash table
00115   key_leaf(1:nleaf-nleaf_me) = pack(htable%key,mask=(htable%node>0 .and. htable%owner /= me))
00116   ind_leaf(1:nleaf-nleaf_me) = pack(htable%node,mask=(htable%node>0 .and. htable%owner /= me))         ! leaf index
00117   plist_leaf(1:nleaf-nleaf_me) = pack(htable%childcode,mask=(htable%node>0 .and. htable%owner /= me))   ! global particle label
00118   owner_leaf(1:nleaf-nleaf_me) = pack(htable%owner,mask=(htable%node>0 .and. htable%owner /= me))   ! who owns leaf node
00119 
00120 
00121   write (ipefile,'(//a/a/(4i5,2o15,i5,2f11.4,f6.1,f11.4))') 'Non-local leaves from hash-table:', &
00122        '    i   owner    i-leaf    lev    key    parent  plabel  xcoc  ycoc  charge      ', &
00123        (i,owner_leaf(i),ind_leaf(i),node_level(ind_leaf(i)),key_leaf(i), &
00124         ishft( key_leaf(i),-3 ), &      ! parent
00125         plist_leaf(i), & ! global particle label
00126         xcoc(ind_leaf(i)),ycoc(ind_leaf(i)), charge(ind_leaf(i)), xdip(ind_leaf(i)), &
00127         i=1,nleaf-nleaf_me)
00128 
00129 ! Interaction lists
00130   
00131   write(ipefile,'(//a)') 'Interaction lists'
00132   do i=1,npp
00133      write(ipefile,'(//a,i5,a,i5)') 'Particle ',pelabel(i),' # terms: ',nterm(i)
00134      write(ipefile,'(a/(4i7))') 'List: key,owner,node',(intlist(j,i),htable( key2addr( intlist(j,i),'DIAGNOSE_TREE' ) )%owner &
00135           ,htable( key2addr( intlist(j,i),'DIAGNOSE_TREE' ) )%node,nodelist(j,i),j=1,nterm(i))
00136   end do
00137 
00138 
00139 
00140 
00141 end subroutine diagnose_tree
